title: Resolve Russian issue before bilateral ties are damaged: Dinesh
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister Dinesh Gunawardena says that the Sri Lankan authorities should take immediate action to resolve the issue regarding the Russian ‘Aeroflot’ aircraft detained in Sri Lanka.
The Minister said that immediate action should be taken before any major damage is done between the two countries and the economy, during an event held in Kesbewa – Gorakapitiya area.
